posts.postText: In the jail break sever Sloogz was a guard and i was a prisoner. Twice he killed me when i was disguised as a guard. The first time he said he saw me change which I doubt. The second time i know he didn't see me change, and he gave no reason to why he killed me.
Please use the correct ban request template and you need proof (screenshots or video).
Repost with proof if you have it.
